title: Poison Resistance (mutation)
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||rPois||Your system is resistant to poisons.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
'''Species notes:''' [[Naga]]s start with rank 1. Green [[draconian]]s develop rank 1 upon changing color. [[Gargoyle]]s are instead immune to poison.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Good_mutations|Good mutation]]
|}
